ygData.subject: Re: Where's a good place for a LvL 22 DE NECRO to fight?? Pl...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... don t ... The big thing about being a necro is the abilty to be ablie to solo huge yellow and sometimes reds. I fought the aviak guards at level 16 and
ygData.messageBody:
>
>> Question, Where is a good place for a LvL 22 DE Necro to fight? Pls
don't
>> say Cazic Thule cuz I HATE the PING in there and my frame rate sucks in
>> there and its so crowded. Anywhere but there, any suggestions?
>
>South Karan The Aviacs are good to hunt.
>
The big thing about being a necro is the abilty to be ablie to solo huge
yellow and sometimes reds. I fought the aviak guards at level 16 and thats
what they were for me. I went from 16 frighting red guards and yellows. to
being 21 in 3 days. At that point I see a yellow once in a blue moon. Time
to move on!!!! Go kill somewhere else where you can get better exp. I moved
on to treant in kartana. The staff is worth 13 pp in the store alon. HEHE
and the aviaks are broke mo fos.. Good luck..
